text: The Million Pound Drop Live is a British quiz show. It began on 24 May 2010 and is shown on Channel 4. It is presented by Davina McCall. ==International versions== Country Title Host Channel Top prize Top prize Winners First aired 100 Milionë Eno Popi Top Channel 100,000,000 lek 0 11 January 2011 Salven el Millón Susana Giménez Telefe AR$1,000,000 1 9 June–22 December 2011 The Million Dollar Drop Eddie McGuire Nine Network A$1,000,000 0 21 March 2011-28 April 2011 Um Milhão na Mesa Silvio Santos SBT R$1,000,000 0 21 September–14 December 2011 Да ти паднат 100 хиляди Da ti padnat 100 khilyadi Niki Kunchev Nova 100,000лв 0 12 March 2012 Atrapa los Millones Don Francisco Canal 13 CL$400,000,000 0 25 March 2012 Millones por montones María José Barraza Canal Caracol CO$1,000,000,000 0 25 July 2011 Pengene på bordet Claus Elming TV2 2,000,000Kr 0 2013 (all episodes were recorded in July 2012) أنت والمليون Inta wal milyon Nagla Badr Mehwar TV 1,000,000 EGP 0 24 February 2012 Rahaauk Alari Kivisaar TV3 €100,000 0 12 September 2011 Money Drop Laurence Boccolini TF1 €250,000 0 1 August 2011 Rette die Million!
